name: Advanced Chart for Elementor
author: KAP ASIAs

sections.description:
Elementor addon to use creative chart layout to your site with Advanced Chart.

5+ Charts like Line, Bar, Radar, Pie & Doughnut, Polar…

Advanced Chart for Elementor Try Testing Environment

Supercharge your Elementor Page Builder with Highly customizable Free Essential Classy Addons For Elementor

Check below demo pages.

Demo Page

Features

  • Easy to customize options.
  • Line Chart
  • Vertical & Horizontal Bar Chart
  • radar Chart
  • Pie & Doughnut Chart
  • Polararea Chart
  • Bubble Chart
  • Scatter Chart (Comming Soon)
  • Grid Options
  • Zero Line
  • labels
  • ScaleLabel for X and Y axis
  • Legend Options
  • Tooltip Options
  • Animation Options
  • and many more…
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin and activate it
  2. Edit any page/post using edit with elementor option
  3. On elementor widget menu, search/scroll and find the Advanced Chart
  4. Drag and drop this addon, where you have to add the chart
  5. Customize the options
  6. in a minute you have added the Advanced Chart, Keep on crafting creative layout using Elementor Page Builder and Advanced Chart for Elementor.
sections.faq:
Will it work without Elementor page builder?

No. It does not work without Elementor

Will it work with any theme?

Absolutely. It will work with any theme where Elementor works.
